data.text: @Smackenziekerr The lack of denial that the Wuhan lab had their patented sequence in the first place speaks volumes. It means that indeed, the lab could have been using their sequence as part of their research. Otherwise he would have said that it was impossible and no need to investigate.
@Smackenziekerr And their darpa funding which was never disclosed as required by law thus fulfilling fraud status
@Smackenziekerr new and unusual things are discovered every day.  Thats what science is all about.
@Smackenziekerr Thats what science is all about: discovering the unexpected.
@Smackenziekerr people used to think that human flight was impossible too.
@Smackenziekerr you do realize that naturally occuring gene sequences are patented all the time?  This doesnt prove anything.
@Smackenziekerr That's a nice way of saying.... sell your Moderna stocks

@Smackenziekerr Maria did fumble the opportunity to point out that Bancel's name is on the patent, yet he has to check with his science team.
Meaning he is not part of the science team.
